title: Assassins.Creed.Unity.Update.v1.2-RELOADED
description:
nERv

                    Assassin's Creed Unity Update V1.2 (c) Ubisoft 

        11/2014 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
              - :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Action, Adventure 

    

  Special note:
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Assassins.Creed.Unity.Proper-SKIDROW ... What was the point of that?
  If it's just to "get back" at us for cleaning up your last mess, then sorry,
  but this is about as annoying as hearing a bad joke. Told by a  mentally
  challenged person. Who just pissed his pants. 

  We're not going to bother listing all of the things wrong with this
  2-weeks-late "proper". Next time, just save everybody some time & bandwidth,
  and pre a nfo with a link to the cs.rin.ru post you were reading. 

  Release note:
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Committed to fixing any problems with our releases that we are aware of,
  we bring you this update. As usual, updated files are replaced. And the big
  and supposedly broken datafile (~15gb) is fixed using a patch (~20mb). 

  Check included changelog.txt for changes. 


  Game Assassin's Creed Unity is an action/adventure game set in the
  city of Paris during one of its darkest hours, the French Revolution. Take
  ownership of the story by customising Arno's equipement to make the
  experience unique to you, both visually and mechanically. In addition to an
  epic single-player experience, Assassin's Creed Unity delivers the excitement
  of playing with up to three friends through online cooperative gameplay in
  specific missions. Throughout the game, take part in one of the most pivotal
  moments of French history in a compelling storyline and a breath-taking
  playground that brought you the city of lights of today. 

  

  1. Unrar.
  2. Install the update to where Assassins.Creed.Unity-RELOADED is installed.
  3. Make sure you have enough free space (~15gb) before patching.
  4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory to your game
     install directory.
  5. Play the game.
  6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
